attr.title: Cybarian
attr.desc: Cybarian The Time Travelling Warrior is a classically inspired arcade action game, with a mixture of modern and retro gaming tropes. Designed to be played through in a single sitting, there are limited checkpoints and no saves.
attr.inst: Download the game from https://store.steampowered.com/app/928840/Cybarian_The_Time_Travelling_Warrior/ and place Cybarian.exe to the assets folder.
attr.inst_md: Download the game from [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/928840/Cybarian_The_Time_Travelling_Warrior/)  and place `Cybarian.exe` to the `assets` folder.
